# completion

**Instance Property**

The completion which will be sent to a `Subscriber`.

## Declaration

```swift
var completion: Subscribers.Completion<Failure> { get }
```

## Inspecting publisher properties

- **output**: The output which will be sent to a `Subscriber`.
